title: Democratic Party (Italy) - Wikipedia
snippet: Cuperlo, whose support was higher in the South, came second with 18.2% while Civati, whose message did well with northern urban and progressive voters, came third with 14.2%. On 15 December, Renzi, whose executive included many young people and a majority of women, was proclaimed secretary by the party's national assembly while Cuperlo was elected president as proposed by Renzi.

title: List of presidents of the Democratic Party (Italy) - Wikipedia
snippet: The president of the Democratic Party is one of the leaders of the Democratic Party, the main centre-left political party in Italy. The current president is Stefano Bonaccini.
